posts.postText: And that's all folks, alot sooner then i thought it would be... next map should have harder ones...

For the UFO, I found it when I was testing it out with Peram . Only us. :(

 Edit:  Got it.

http://steamcommunity.com/id/MrGash/screenshot/559784493884441974
http://steamcommunity.com/id/MrGash/screenshot/559784493884444724

I would have preferred both the scoreboard and the ufo in the same screenshot, but the steam pictures have timestamps... seeing as the pictures were taken at nigh the same time, it counts. Next time we meet, the contest prize #1 is yours, you greedy monster.
But I will keep up my promise, the points are still yours next time we meet.

>> I would have preferred both the scoreboard and the ufo in the same screenshot, but the steam pictures have timestamps... seeing as the pictures were taken at nigh the same time, it counts. Next time we meet, the contest prize #1 is yours, you greedy monster. 
If you look closely you can see the UFO behind the scoreboard, partially.

And Tommynator's message is still there, on both screenshots, so at most it can only be about ten seconds apart.

http://k.min.us/icQKpA.JPG 

You were in-game with me, so I won. Game over man.. Game over

I'd like to point out, that this picture has everything require, even though at first glance its not that easy to tell... two of the cubes are right next to each other... also, he died shortly after this screenshot, how lucky of him to make it in time.
